def rotate_matrix(mat, n):
    for _ in range(n):
        if not mat:
            return []
        top = 1
        bottom = len(mat) - 1
        left = 0
        right = len(mat[0]) - 1
        while left < right and top < bottom:
            prev = mat[top + 1][left]
            for i in range(left, right + 1):
                curr = mat[top][i]
                mat[top][i] = prev
                prev = curr
            top += 1
            for i in range(top, bottom + 1):
                curr = mat[i][right]
                mat[i][right] = prev
                prev = curr
            right -= 1
            for i in range(right, left - 1, -1):
                curr = mat[bottom][i]
                mat[bottom][i] = prev
                prev = curr
            bottom -= 1
            for i in range(bottom, top - 1, -1):
                curr = mat[i][left]
                mat[i][left] = prev
                prev = curr
            left += 1
    return mat
